C2 the situation when the parts of something fit together in a natural or reasonable way: There was no coherence between the first and the second half of the movie. Essays will be marked for punctuation, grammar and coherency.
More examplesFewer examplesThe team started the second half with more coherence.The album is characterized by its absence of coherence. We conducted an experiment to check the coherency of our theory.
